name: Blood Island
description: The navigator Navi'Tan from the southern lands finds a mysterious fragment of a crystal resembling a ruby. He decides to solve the riddle and collect all the parts of the artifact together, especially since the stone began to control the mind of the young sailor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
